text:
As a reader subjected only to the result and not involved in the process, I find Acknowledgements sections in papers always a little out of place and uninteresting and often skip reading them, but dang has this essay writing process opened my eyes to why these sections exist.

I am incredibly grateful for everyone who takes the time to seriously make an effort to understand an author’s crude early attempt to express themselves and then write detailed feedback to help them do it better.
